abstract: Republishes elements until another publisher emits an element.

declaration.code:
func prefix

(untilOutputFrom publisher: P) -> Publishers.PrefixUntilOutput where P : Publisher

overview:
## Return Value

A publisher that republishes elements until the second publisher publishes an element.

## Discussion

After the second publisher publishes an element, the publisher returned by this method finishes.
rawMarkdown:
--- source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/Combine/Publisher/prefix(untilOutputFrom:) crawled: 2025-12-05T01:12:53Z --- # prefix(untilOutputFrom:) **Instance Method** Republishes elements until another publisher emits an element. ## Declaration ```swift func prefix

(untilOutputFrom publisher: P) -> Publishers.PrefixUntilOutput where P : Publisher ``` ## Parameters - **publisher**: A second publisher. ## Return Value A publisher that republishes elements until the second publisher publishes an element. ## Discussion After the second publisher publishes an element, the publisher returned by this method finishes. ## Applying sequence operations to elements - **drop(untilOutputFrom:)**: Ignores elements from the upstream publisher until it receives an element from a second publisher. - **dropFirst(_:)**: Omits the specified number of elements before republishing subsequent elements. - **drop(while:)**: Omits elements from the upstream publisher until a given closure returns false, before republishing all remaining elements. - **tryDrop(while:)**: Omits elements from the upstream publisher until an error-throwing closure returns false, before republishing all remaining elements. - **append(_:)**: Appends a publisher’s output with the specified elements. - **append(_:)**: Appends a publisher’s output with the specified sequence. - **append(_:)**: Appends the output of this publisher with the elements emitted by the given publisher. - **prepend(_:)**: Prefixes a publisher’s output with the specified values. - **prepend(_:)**: Prefixes a publisher’s output with the specified sequence. - **prepend(_:)**: Prefixes the output of this publisher with the elements emitted by the given publisher. - **prefix(_:)**: Republishes elements up to the specified maximum count. - **prefix(while:)**: Republishes elements while a predicate closure indicates publishing should continue. - **tryPrefix(while:)**: Republishes elements while an error-throwing predicate closure indicates publishing should continue.
